Data - Class in suncertify.db
This is the Data file required to manage/implement DB interface of the specification given which handles the various manipulation of the database record

This Constructor initialises the data class and loads all required database manager using the designed database Model

This Constructor initialises the data class and loads all required database manager using the designed database Model
data - Static variable in class suncertify.db.DatabaseManager
 
DatabaseManager - Class in suncertify.db
This Class Manages the Database, implementing new functions in the URLyBirdDataManager interface for data access flexibility and extensibility to Manage the database records
DatabaseManager(String) - Constructor for class suncertify.db.DatabaseManager
Construct this class with a String value of the database file location / path
DatabaseManager(File) - Constructor for class suncertify.db.DatabaseManager
Construct this class with a File instance of the database file
dataMaxLength - Static variable in class suncertify.db.DatabaseManager
 
DateHelperManager - Class in suncertify.gui.util
This Object serves as a Tool tip presentation of the Date entry for the user when adding a new Hotel Record.
DateHelperManager(JTextField, JTextField, JTextField) - Constructor for class suncertify.gui.util.DateHelperManager
Constructs this Object with the Year, Month and Day JTextFields respectively to be dynamically changing text state in respect of user input either right/wrong
DB - Interface in suncertify.db
This interface as required has functions which is meant to be implemented by the Data class file
DBDataModel - Class in suncertify.db
This Object is the model for the database file record, it interacts with the Database file directly.

This constructs the database model object with a String value of the database file path
DBDataModel(File) - Constructor for class suncertify.db.DBDataModel
This constructs the database model object with a File instance

delete(int, long) - Method in interface suncertify.db.DB
Deletes a record, making the record number and associated disk storage available for reuse.

DuplicateKeyException - Exception in suncertify.db
This handles Exception when the a Newly added record have same Hotel Name and Location which is flagged ACTIVE in the database record.

an empty argument when : New record that want to added already exist in the database
